definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The directional movement is called the horizontal mickey count and the vertical mickey count.
sentences.chinese: 方向性移動叫做水平米鼠數和垂直米鼠數。

sentences.english: No obvious directivity occurs in the songs of black cicada.
sentences.chinese: 黑蟬鳴聲的波形結構無明顯的方向性。

sentences.english: In which direction is the urban rail signalling technology heading?
sentences.chinese: 城市鐵路用信號系統技術的今後方向性將會如何？

sentences.english: Millimeter-wave dielectric lens antenna is a kind of aperture antenna with high directivity.
sentences.chinese: 毫米波介質透鏡天線是一種高方向性的口徑天線。

sentences.english: First of all, it is omnidirectional.
At a practical level, non-directive moral education turns moral instruction on its head.
sentences.chinese: 在一個實用水平，非方向性道德教育轉向道德指導。

sentences.english: The antenna received signals with no directivity.
sentences.chinese: 那種天線可接受沒有方向性的信號。

sentences.english: Directional divergence can occur when the airplane lacks directional or weathercock stability.
sentences.chinese: 當飛機方向性穩定不夠時會造成方向性發散。

sentences.english: Directional divergence can occur when the airplane lacks directional or weathercock stability.
sentences.chinese: 當飛機方向性穩定不夠時會造成方向性發散。

sentences.english: However, the directional features were unobvious for the other two pads with relatively softer surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 相對較軟的其它兩種焊盤上接合痕方向性特徵不明顯。

sentences.english: In other words, what is your site's purpose?
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，創建網站要有一定的目標性和方向性。

sentences.english: Its directivity is hardly noticeable due to the closeness of the sources.
sentences.chinese: 這種方向性由於電源密封式是很難顯而易見。

sentences.english: The directional characteristic of microphone is an important factor in the measurement of directional distribution of sound field.
sentences.chinese: 傳聲器的指向性對聲場方向性分佈的測量有很大影響。

definition: specific to a particular stage (of a project etc)/interim (policy etc)/occurring in stages/phased
